scripts.invoke-get-history-lambda-prod: cd aws-lambda/functions && serverless invoke -f getLoRHistoryByChannelId --path getLoRHistory_local_request_data.json
scripts.invoke-get-history-lambda: cd aws-lambda/functions && serverless invoke local -f getLoRHistoryByChannelId --path getLoRHistory_local_request_data.json
scripts.invoke-post-history-lambda-prod: cd aws-lambda/functions && serverless invoke -f updateLoRHistory --path updateLoRHistory_local_request_data.json
scripts.invoke-post-history-lambda: cd aws-lambda/functions && serverless invoke local -f updateLoRHistory --path updateLoRHistory_local_request_data.json
